column4: With Lucid, are there known issues with recent X servers?  I am finding regular [every day] lockups where the mouse moves but everything becomes non-responsive.  You can't do anything and have to kill X with CTRL-ALT-BACKSPACE which is extremely bad.
you are behind. we are on Karmic now.
sorry I meant Karmic, not lucid
oh and that shitty deal with the Archive Mounter having all the filenames ending in the ;1? that got fixed in an update i got 2 days ago and now its awesome
